znanii_mnogo_ne_byvaet: THERE IS NEVER TOO MUCH KNOWLEDGE
v_verhnem_meniu_raspolozhena_knopka_s_na: There is a settings button located in the top menu. Click on it.
pervym_punktom_idut_startovye_parametry_: The first item shows the starting parameters. Here you can view information about the current session.
ostalos_eshche_nemnogo_funktsii_kotorye_: There are still a few functions left that will be useful to you in the game. Go to the cattery.
kotenka_mozhno_vysadit_iz_domika_ili_per: You can remove a kitten from the house or move it into the window for adult cats. Move one male kitten into the neighboring large window.
kotyat_kotorye_ostalis_s_mamoi_mozhno_ne: Kittens that remain with their mother do not need to be fed separately — feeding the mother is enough. The cat will feed the kittens until they grow up. But a separated kitten now has to be fed individually.
chtoby_ne_tratit_dengi_na_lechenie_kotya: To avoid spending money on treating kittens, you can insure the house. Insurance of the house for
poprobuem_nazhmi_na_knopku_strakhovki: . Try it! Click the insurance button.
strakhovka_kuplena_kotyata_kotorye_rodya: The insurance has been purchased. Kittens born in the next season will be treated for free. But a kitten that got sick before the insurance will have to be treated for
teper_davai_posmotrim_chto_mozhno_delat_: Now let’s see what can be done in the deals window. Return to the main screen.
v_vitrine_magazina_raspolozhena_zelenaya: There is a green button with a message cloud in the shop’s showcase. Click it to send a message to the pet shop.
v_igre_s_nastoyashchimi_igrokami_otkroet: In a game with real players, a chat will open and you will be able to communicate with the shop.
chernye_devochki_klikni_na_etogo_kotenka: black girl kittens. Click on this kitten in your showcase.
kotik_v_domike: THE KITTEN IS IN THE HOUSE
teper_ty_vidish_otdelno_kazhdogo_kotenka: Now you see each kitten separately. That is, kittens sitting in the large house window are displayed with a house icon.
sezona_i_on_peremestitsya_v_oblast_sdelk: season(s) and it will move into the deal area.
mozhno_ne_vybirat_kotenka_po_vozrastu_a_: You do not have to choose a kitten by age; you can simply drag a male kitten from your showcase into the deal zone or double-click it. Drag a kitten!
v_etom_sluchae_v_sdelku_popadet_samyi_ml: In this case, the youngest kitten will be added to the deal. Now send the deal.
v_sdelke_est_kotik_kotorogo_my_prodaem_i: The deal includes a kitten that we are selling from the house; this time let’s confirm the deal, but in a regular game be careful when selling kittens.
sdelka_eshche_ne_sostoyalas: THE DEAL HAS NOT HAPPENED YET
sdelka_otpravlena_no_magazin_poka_ne_kup: The deal has been sent, but the shop has not bought the kitten yet, which means you can sell it to another shop. Switch to another shop’s showcase.
davai_predlozhim_koshechku_vozrastom: Let’s offer a girl kitten aged
sezona_zoomagazinu_zoomir_klikni_na_kosh: season(s) to the pet shop «Zoomir». Click on the girl kitten.
nazhmi_na_sokhranit_chtoby_zakryt_eto_ok: Click «Save» to close this window and send the deal.
sdelki_v_kazhdoi_iz_kotorykh_odin_i_tot_: deal(s), and each of them contains the same kitten.
magazin_polosatyi_odobril_sdelku_kotenok: The shop «Striped» approved the deal — the kitten is sold. The second deal is now left without a kitten — it returned in an orange envelope. Open it.
ty_mozhesh_zamenit_prodannogo_kotenka_v_: You can replace the sold kitten in the deal or remove it completely. Click the cross above the girl kitten.
peretashchi_v_sdelku_chernuyu_devochku_i: Drag the black girl kitten into the deal or double-click her.
teper_nazhmi_knopku_otpravit_poka_ty_ne_: Now click the «Send» button. Until you send the offer, the pet shop will not see it.
poka_zoomagazin_ne_soglasoval_sdelku_ty_: While the pet shop has not agreed to the deal, you can always cancel it. Click the envelope.
nazhmi_na_knopku_chtoby_otmenit_otpravle: Click the button to cancel the sent deal.
ty_poprosil_u_zoomagazina_prodat_tebe_ko: You asked the pet shop to sell you kittens. Waiting for the shop’s response.
posmotri_zdorovy_li_kotiki_i_kakogo_oni_: Check whether the kittens are healthy and how old they are. Click any kitten.
magazin_prisyal_kotиков_na_prodazhu_otkr: The shop sent kittens for sale. Open the envelope.
peretashchi_lupu_iz_pravogo_nizhnego_ugl: Drag the magnifier from the bottom right corner onto the kittens.
v_sdelke_4_kotenka_nazhimai_na_knopku_vl: There are 4 kittens in the deal. Press the left and right buttons to check them all.
vse_kotyata_zdorovy_i_ustraivayut_nas_po: All kittens are healthy and suitable in age. Close the magnifier and approve the deal.
ty_znaesh_vse_o_business_cats_igrai_vyst: You know everything about Business Cats. Play, build strategies, win!
